quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you’ve been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
You are my heart, my life, my entire existence.
In your smile, I see something more beautiful than the stars.
Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
It's hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.
Sometimes, the person you want most is the person you’re best without.
We all make someone cry, we all make someone smile. But we must choose which we do more often.
The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
Good friends are like stars. You don’t always see them, but you know they’re always there.
A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
Every time I see you, I fall in love all over again.
You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
When I look into your eyes, I see the rest of my life in front of me.
I could start fires with what I feel for you.
